channel.title: Mythic Craft PVP
channel.description:
IP: 70.171.216.211
Welcome to Mythic Craft pvp server. This is a faction server and we do not welcome hackers but we do welcome raiders. You can either raid a small base or kill a whole faction! The owner is Reflexbeast. This server has a lot of plugins including MCMMO! So join us now for an awesome faction server!
Picture of spawn
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R2PrZ.png[/img]
